name: 陌界·启示录
description:
The game is a fantasy-themed RPG telling the story of a teenage hexer saving an elven forest from a evil factory. The main character would go on a amazing journey in which he would encounter werewolves, vampiric alpors（吸血鬼） and other strange creatures.
The game is focused on story-telling, including themes of dreams and psychological descriptions, which add literary styles to this game. The scenes are beautiful as well, including elven forests, beaches, Ettin(双头巨人） caves and wizard castles.
Unfortunately, The game only supports Chinese. Therefore, if you are a Chinese learner, you can try to play it.
